title: Bitcoin hash rate soars to 562.81 EH/s amid rising mining difficulty
description: Bitcoin’s mining difficulty has exceeded 80 trillion, setting a new record. According to data from BTC.com, the difficulty level reached an unprecedented 81.73 trillion on February 16, indicating a continuous upward trend that began in January 2023. This increase in difficulty is paralleled by a surge in the network’s hash rate, which has achieved a […]
